sentences.english: Old trees are alive antiques and living national treasures.
sentences.chinese: 古树是活着的古董，是有生命的国宝。

sentences.english: Now there are 7 Chinese sturgeons left which the park originally received from the mainland.
sentences.chinese: 大陆共赠港10条国宝级的中华鲟，现在剩7条。

sentences.english: Neil: Ok, Jean, this place is a British institution.
sentences.chinese: 这可是英国的国宝级单位。

sentences.english: A national treasure – Dragon Carved Bronze Plate – dated back to late Shang Dynasty is preserved here.
sentences.chinese: 现有晚商时期的国宝级文物青铜蟠龙大盘。

sentences.english: The fourth part discusses how to ensure the brand-orientation and advertisement-spread of GuoBao.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分是关于国宝品牌定位与广告传播的保障建设。

sentences.english: The 27-year-old National Basketball Association player is treated as a national treasure.
sentences.chinese: 这位27岁的NBA球员被视为国宝。

sentences.english: It is widely known that the panda is our national treasure.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知大熊猫是国宝。

sentences.english: What degree is this national treasure level master as big as?
sentences.chinese: 这个国宝级大师大到什么程度？

sentences.english: Because Sichuan is hometown of our country national treasure pandas, bamboo planter very many.
sentences.chinese: 由于四川是我国国宝猫熊之故乡，竹子种植甚多。

sentences.english: Chairman of the Bank of East Asia David Li agrees that the HOS should be revived.
sentences.chinese: 另外，东亚银行主席李国宝也赞成复建居屋。

sentences.english: Mr Li has close business ties with Michael Leung Kai Hung, Ms Wong's father.
sentences.chinese: 李国宝与王梁家安的父亲梁启雄有着密切的商业关系。

sentences.english: The giant panda is known as the national treasure of China.
sentences.chinese: 大熊猫被称为中国的“国宝”。

sentences.english: Some cellars in Wuliangye have become national treasure.
sentences.chinese: 五粮液的一些酒窖已成国宝。

sentences.english: "The panda is a national treasure, and I love and respect [him], so I didn't fight back, " Zhang said.
sentences.chinese: 熊猫是国宝，我热爱并尊敬‘他’，因此我没有反攻。

sentences.english: Liu Yunxiang told jade harp has the responsibility to protect the national treasure in the body must stay.
sentences.chinese: 刘云翔告诉玉琴自己有保护国宝的重任在身必须留下。

sentences.english: Messrs. Leung and Li share a history of business and social dealings.
sentences.chinese: 梁启雄与李国宝曾有生意和社交往来。

definition: Palace Museum, in the Forbidden City, Beijing/National Palace Museum, Taipei
Dangu district of Hengyang city 衡陽市|衡阳市[Heng2 yang2 shi4], Hunan
the Forbidden City/abbr. for 故宮博物院|故宫博物院[Gu4 gong1 Bo2 wu4 yuan4]
to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 jia1 Bo2 wu4 guan3
